trends: There have been 158 other sightings in Portland
There were no other sightings in Portland on or around January 25th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsOn January 25th we were taking my brother to school and when we were crossing the bridge i noticed something moving around in the sky. I thought at first it was the sunlight just playing tricks on me but then the fighter jets showed up. There were two of them slowly approaching the thing. Then i realized it wasn't just the light. The thing was shiny and looked like some type of metal shining in the sunlight. The thing was suddenly gone and the fighters zoomed after it. My friends and i have been seeing these things and it is starting to freak us out. Please reply, Owen.
Summary: round thing in sky not airplane going really fast by mount hood.
